definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)
to charge and break through enemy lines

sentences.english: No REAL cop would have an Uzi that size.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何一个真警察会用那种大小的冲锋枪。

sentences.english: The soldiers couched their rifles and prepared to charge.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们将步枪放平准备冲锋。

sentences.english: In the belief battlefield, he maintains at the life the charge posture.
sentences.chinese: 在信仰的战场上，他把生命保持在冲锋的姿态。

sentences.english: They wear ski masks and carry pistols and machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 他们戴着滑雪面具，携带手枪和冲锋枪。

sentences.english: Several regiments of Russian infantry surged up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 几个团的苏军步兵向山上冲锋。

sentences.english: Peter now ordered a counter-charge, splitting the Swedish line in two.
sentences.chinese: 彼得此时命令发起反冲锋，将瑞典军队一分为二。

sentences.english: I first assault immediately to the best-off gluten.
sentences.chinese: 我先冲锋最好马上来个断筋。

sentences.english: Other officers and submachine gunners were asked to wait outside until we come back.
sentences.chinese: 其他军官和冲锋枪手被要求留在外边等我们出来。

sentences.english: The Federals kept on coming long past the point where all the pleasure of whipping them vanished.
sentences.chinese: 迎头痛击的乐趣早已消失，北军仍在冲锋。

sentences.english: Liu Changjiang strikes skeleton staff for the 25-year-old Fan Jinwen.
sentences.chinese: 为刘昌强冲锋陷阵的得力干将樊金文今年25岁。

sentences.english: By this time, even females were allowed to serve as stormtroopers.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时期，女性也正式获准参加冲锋队。

sentences.english: Random Submachine Gun, Shotgun, and Pistol at beginning of round.
sentences.chinese: 随机枪械组合，包含冲锋枪，散弹枪和手枪。

sentences.english: The stormtroopers opened fire and chased the Ewoks into the woods.
sentences.chinese: 帝国冲锋队一边开火一边把伊渥克人赶进森林。

sentences.english: After a fierce charge, our soldiers drove the enemy from the hill-top.
sentences.chinese: 在猛烈的冲锋后，我们的士兵把敌人赶下了山头。

sentences.english: An interesting question is the ancestry of the design of Uzi submachinegun .
sentences.chinese: 一个有趣的问题是对乌兹冲锋枪的设计血统。

sentences.english: You asked me what type of SMG we used in our company.
sentences.chinese: 你问我在连队里我们用什么型号的冲锋枪。

definition: to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
to attack with a bladed weapon
